thread.title: Michigan State President Resigns Amid Nassar Scandal

author: Douglas Belkin
title: Michigan State President Resigns Amid Nassar Scandal
text:
Lou Anna K. Simon resigned as president of Michigan State University on Wednesday night, hours after a judge sentenced a doctor who worked at the school to up to 175 years in prison on sexual-abuse charges.
Dr. Simon has faced mounting calls to step down in recent weeks, most recently from the state’s senators, Gary Peters and Debbie Stabenow. Michigan’s House of Representatives passed a nonbinding resolution 96-11 earlier Wednesday urging her to resign or for the board to fire her.
...
